 Allow provisionning using 
Ansible
.






Warning


Ansible will be much slower to provision ephemeral instances than 
packer
, as
by design it operate at runtime, and have to execute for each instance creation. When possible, the usage
of whatever + 
packer
 is advised, as this technique allow you to provision your image ahead of time.






 Allow application provisionning with a 
Packer
 image.
